page.title: 20ORGANISATIONS IN EAKRING
page.content: Most of the activities takes place in the Cator Hall and the Methodist Room. On Monday there is an Upholstry class, Tuesday evening the Oakring Club which is a Social Club for mainly retired people meets twice a month. The Womens Institiute meet every 3rd Tuesday. On Wednesday there is s Keep Fit class. Thursday is Parish Council once a month. Friday is Brownie night and the Youth Club. There is a playing Fields Committee and a Cator Hall Management Committee. There is Methodist Fellowship which meets on a regular basis. This project has been carried out by Eakring Womens Institute with some topics from Bilsthorpe W.I. and 2 men who have written a topic each, 1 man who took the photographs and 1 man who has put it all on Computer. We hope it sets down a true record.
